entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a person who is excitedly announcing the results of the competition. He can be heard shouting and laughing.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person who is participating in the competition, as indicated by Bagman's announcement that she must have been successful too.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person who is also participating in the competition. He is announced by Bagman and slouches out of the tent.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is watching the competition from within the tent. He feels anxious and fearful, but also seems to be observing himself from outside his body.

relationships.description: Bagman announces Fleur's success in the competition, indicating that she has done well.
Bagman announces Krum's participation in the competition, introducing him to Harry.
